mapper.insert: insert into doctor ( doctor_id, class_id, doctor_ch_name, doctor_en_name, doctor_ch_position, doctor_en_position, doctor_introduction, doctor_img, doctor_sex, doctor_mobile, doctor_email, ctime, doctor_code, doctor_consult, doctor_booknum, doctor_workyear, doctor_grade, doctor_good_reception ) values ( #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorChName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorChPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorEnPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), 0, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorConsult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorBooknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorWorkyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorGoodReception,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select doctor_id, class_id, doctor_ch_name, doctor_en_name, doctor_ch_position, doctor_en_position,doctor_introduction, doctor_img,doctor_sex,doctor_mobile,doctor_email,ctime,status, doctor_consult,doctor_booknum,doctor_workyear,doctor_grade,doctor_good_reception from doctor where doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status=0

select doctor_id, class_id, doctor_ch_name, doctor_en_name, doctor_ch_position, doctor_en_position,doctor_introduction, doctor_img,doctor_sex,doctor_mobile,doctor_email,ctime,status, doctor_consult,doctor_booknum,doctor_workyear,doctor_grade,doctor_good_reception from doctor where status=0
